brokerProfiles.companyOverview:
Corbett Restaurant Group is a leading commercial real estate firm with offices in Boston, New York, Florida, and California, that specializes in the sale and leasing of restaurants. Our experience and expertise make us an invaluable partner to have when buying or selling a restaurant on any level.

Corbett Restaurant Group is a professional organization whose top priority is client service; we are firmly committed to confidentiality, integrity and excellence.  

Selling or buying a business is a major decision; you want the very best professional guidance available.  Corbett Restaurant Group has dedicated itself to understanding the restaurant business and has discovered what it takes to bring buyers and sellers together within this industry.  We drive each and every transaction through to an orderly close. As a trusted advisor, we provide the information and tools necessary for our clients to make the best decisions.
brokerProfiles.introduction:
Todd Smith – President & Managing Partner, has over $300,000,000 in sales transactions and retail leasing. Working with companies and institutions ranging from Independent Operators to Regional & National Chains.

Expertise in the Industry with a deeply rooted network of Operators, Chefs and Food & Beverage Professionals in the Greater Boston Area, New York, Florida, and California.
brokerProfiles.affiliations:
Corbett Hub - https://corbetthub.com/
Corbett Business Sales and Acquisitions -  https://corbettbusinessgroup.com/ 
Boston Valuation Services - https://bostonvaluations.com/

Massachusetts Restaurant Association
National Restaurant Association
IBBA
NEBBA
brokerProfiles.services:
Seller Representation - As we specialize in the sale of restaurants, all listings are handled in a confidential manner, with every effort being made to pre-qualify buyers for both financial strength and operational capability.
Other Services we provide:
-	Market Valuations
-	Consultative Services
-	Buyer Representation
-	Analysis & Advice
brokerProfiles.tagline: Hospitality Food Service specialists committed to Confidentiality, Integrity and Excellence.

expertiseServices.description: Sales of Family or Partner Owned Businesses

brokerProfiles.companyOverview:
Whether you’re buying or selling a license, Liquor License Advisor (formerly Atlantic License Brokers) is a one-stop shop for individuals who want to learn more about the liquor licensing process for the first time as well as seasoned food and beverage professionals looking for assistance as they pursue licenses. 

After over a decade in the liquor licensing world, we’ve refined our process to better serve a vast array of clients with many different requests. Amongst our most popular services, we routinely offer our extensive knowledge base to attorneys who may not be familiar with the specifics of liquor licensing, work with franchise developers to secure licenses that match their timelines and lease obligations, and offer consultations to corporate food and beverage partners on proper zoning and market considerations before they ever break ground. We also regularly work with licensing coordinators and managers, liquor store owners, and lenders on all of their liquor licensing needs. 

Clients come back to Liquor License Advisor time and time again because in addition to years of experience, they know we also work to troubleshoot problems with unmatched resourcefulness and creativity. At the end of the day, we take pride in our expertise and ability to streamline an often stressful and confusing process into a simple and straightforward one.
brokerProfiles.introduction:
Dan Newcomb
dnewcomb@llausa.com
Founder, CEO

Dan is the founder of Liquor License Advisor. He’s advised the nation’s most prominent restaurant, hotel and retail brands for over two decades, working alongside clients as well as attorneys, lenders, and development teams to deliver results with timeliness and integrity. His work in the world of liquor licensing isn’t limited to brokering, either. Dan readily consults many of the largest food and beverage customers in the country on topics such as market research, real estate zoning, and licensing legislation changes.

In addition to an earned reputation for meeting licensing needs with professional and personalized service, Dan loves tackling complex assignments that involve enthusiasm and thinking innovatively to problem-solve. He’s dialed into everything you need to make licensing simple, and looks forward to helping people think bigger about the future.
brokerProfiles.services:
When you need to buy or sell a liquor license, we’re here to troubleshoot and solve the problems that others don’t necessarily have the time or the expertise to work through. Not only are we fluent in the ins and outs of licensing lingo, transaction processes, fees, and more, but we can also offer additional help understanding complex licensing areas like quotas and zoning. 

Often, we collaborate with a number of stakeholders including attorneys, licensing coordinators and managers, franchise developers, food and beverage establishment owners, liquor store owners, lenders, and others to streamline and simplify the process. Whether they want to buy or sell a license, our clients come back to us time and again for our creative problem-solving, ever-expanding expertise, and reliability, all within the context of a particular state and municipality’s licensing laws. 

Building on years of experience in the world of liquor licensing, we pride ourselves on being knowledgeable and resourceful. We will leave no stone unturned when it comes to securing you the licensing deal you want and need.
brokerProfiles.tagline: The Most Reliable Resource for Liquor License Strategy, Availability and Valuation

brokerProfiles.companyOverview:
Corbett Business Sales & Acquisitions is a full-service CRE–offering Business Brokerage, Valuations, Leasing Services and Investment Sales.

We provide premium exposure for clients selling a business in any market. With our offices in Boston, New York and Florida we have nationwide affiliations which include National and International Business Brokerage and Merger & Acquisition Associations.
brokerProfiles.services:
LANDLORD AGENCY
We represent owners including ground-up developers, institutional capital sources, partnerships, and families with underwriting the value of their retail space, identifying tenants, and delivering unique and financially viable occupants that add to the success of ownership’s bottom line. Our services include assistance with team building by sourcing architects, designers, consultants, contractors, subcontractors, and vendors to achieve a unified and thoughtful retail program and merchandise mix. CBG stays active with all of our leasing initiatives to ensure that spaces are opened successfully and on time, and owners are collecting rent according to the terms of the lease.

TENANT REPRESENTATIVE
We help tenants of all shapes and sizes in evaluating submarkets and reviewing opportunities to locate and grow their brands across the retail landscape. Our specialty includes hospitality leasing for restaurants and entertainment venues in urban, often mixed-use environments including office, luxury residential, and hotel product types. For all of our clients, we remain active in every aspect of the search, lease negotiation, design, zoning, permitting, team building, and construction oversight, straight through to opening.

INVESTMENT SALES
Our firm provides valuation and investment sales assistance to owners seeking to sell land or property. We have been involved in pre-planning and zoning review of property ahead of taking sites to market in order to ensure that we are maximizing value and identifying appropriate buyers.

We have represented private owners and investors, non-profits, and developers to evaluate new opportunities to purchase property or divest of assets in multiple product categories and vintages. Our affiliates from Corbett Restaurant Group also provide business valuation and brokerage for the sale of neighborhood-based businesses including all types of hospitality uses such as restaurants, bars, cafes, wine, liquor, and convenience stores,

brokerProfiles.affiliations:
REALTOR
Member, International Council of Shopping Centers

Four brokers, twenty eight cooperating brokers, and operating in seven states from New Hampshire to New Jersey.  Brokers are also licensed realtors in multiple states.  Specializing in sales and acquisitions of closely held businesses. Massachusetts, Rhode Island, Connecticut, New York, and New Jersey. Sharp focus on Manufacturing, Insulation Installation, Technology, Healthcare, Marine, and Large Gas Stations with real estate, and Liquor Stores.

United Brokers Group LLC is a leading generator of SBA loans in its markets with multiple referral agreements in place with leading banks.

Mr. Flynn is an "Industry Expert" for  "The Business Reference Guide" in the Manufacturing category.

Licensed Real Estate Broker in Massachusetts and Rhode Island and a Primary Broker in Rhode Island.

Contributing author and under contract to author articles for the BizBuySell "Knowledge Center" and has been quoted multiple times in "Inc. Magazine", Bloomberg News, other publications.

Marketing strategy tactics include selling New England businesses to those from outside the New England region.

Innovative marketing plans for Buyers and Sellers.  Confidential process.  Problem solving.

Other Robert Flynn business holdings:

1. Managing Partner, "The Corbett Hub" of Boston. www.CorbettHub.com  This company also owns 25% of Boston Valuation Services www.BostonValuations.com and Manhattan Valuation Services www.ManhattanValuations.com 

2. Sold his company Key-Tech, Inc. a patented plastics printing system manufacturing technology company to a publicly traded company in Europe.
value.brokerIntroduction:
Major New England based business brokerage firm with two divisions "Main Street" and "Middle Market" serving the Northeast including Metro New York. Four brokers and other cooperating brokers. Twenty years of experience in representing Buyers and Sellers.  Major markets are Boston, Rhode Island, Worcester, New Bedford, Metro New York, and Hartford.  

United Brokers Group LLC maintains a middle market brokerage division for transactions with values of $1 million or higher.  Unique focus on selling Northeast businesses to Buyers from outside this region.  Our brokers hold real estate licenses in multiple New England states and actively co-broke with licensed professionals who operate in compliance with the relevant state law. 

Leading generator of SBA loans with referral agreements with multiple banks. 

Specializing in manufacturing, insulation installation, healthcare, child day care, large gas stations and other closely held businesses. 

Contributing author and under contract with BizBuySell.

Marketing tactics include our enewsletter netowork, targeted decision maker direct mail from our numerous industry data bases, selected professional peer co-brokering, and internet marketing.

Many states regulate business brokerage.  We recommend that you work with licensed and bonded Business Brokers in compliance with relevant state law.  Rhode Island, for example, regulates business brokerage via  Rhode Island General Law 42-14-12 and please make sure any non-Rhode Island business broker you interview is in compliance with state law.  

The company maintains a large database of buyers and sellers segmented by industry type and state.  We aggressively, professionally, and confidentially market to this community of Buyers and Sellers.

The firm works with Buyers and Sellers to identify, evaluate, and select the best marketing strategies for their objectives and then professionally manages the process using contact management systems and a major data base.

United Brokers Group LLC specializes in supporting exit planning strategies.  We have buyers for many different types of businesses.  

The company works with properly credentialed third party business valuation experts such as those affiliated with Boston Valuation Services www.BostonValuations.com and www.ManhattanValuations.com who provide third party valuations for Buyers, Sellers, attorneys and lenders.  We generally limit valuations to only those provided by one of the five SBA Qualified Source categories such as a CPA with a ABV or CVA  designation.   Mr. Flynn is an "Industry Expert" to the Business Reference Guide in the manufacturing and staffing industry segments.  The Business Reference Guide is the leading provider of "Rules of Thumb" for business valuations and is published annually.

We are members of Rhode Island MLS, the National Association of Realtors, and also members of Kent-Washington Board of Realtors. Robert Flynn is an Associate Broker member of North Star Realty in the  Rhode Island office.

Mr. Flynn is a Cooperating Intermediary with the Gottesman Company in Manhattan and active in Metro New York, Worcester, Plymouth, Massachusetts, Hartford, New Bedford, and Boston.

Robert Flynn is also an author at www.Axial.net with various published articles. Please see archives in the "News and Articles" section of the www.unitedbrokersgrp.com website.

item.name: Robert Flynn
item.description:
Major New England based business brokerage firm with two divisions "Main Street" and "Middle Market" serving the Northeast including Metro New York. Four brokers and other cooperating brokers. Twenty years of experience in representing Buyers and Sellers.  Major markets are Boston, Rhode Island, Worcester, New Bedford, Metro New York, and Hartford.  

United Brokers Group LLC maintains a middle market brokerage division for transactions with values of $1 million or higher.  Unique focus on selling Northeast businesses to Buyers from outside this region.  Our brokers hold real estate licenses in multiple New England states and actively co-broke with licensed professionals who operate in compliance with the relevant state law. 

Leading generator of SBA loans with referral agreements with multiple banks. 

Specializing in manufacturing, insulation installation, healthcare, child day care, large gas stations and other closely held businesses. 

Contributing author and under contract with BizBuySell.

Marketing tactics include our enewsletter netowork, targeted decision maker direct mail from our numerous industry data bases, selected professional peer co-brokering, and internet marketing.

Many states regulate business brokerage.  We recommend that you work with licensed and bonded Business Brokers in compliance with relevant state law.  Rhode Island, for example, regulates business brokerage via  Rhode Island General Law 42-14-12 and please make sure any non-Rhode Island business broker you interview is in compliance with state law.  

The company maintains a large database of buyers and sellers segmented by industry type and state.  We aggressively, professionally, and confidentially market to this community of Buyers and Sellers.

The firm works with Buyers and Sellers to identify, evaluate, and select the best marketing strategies for their objectives and then professionally manages the process using contact management systems and a major data base.

United Brokers Group LLC specializes in supporting exit planning strategies.  We have buyers for many different types of businesses.  

The company works with properly credentialed third party business valuation experts such as those affiliated with Boston Valuation Services www.BostonValuations.com and www.ManhattanValuations.com who provide third party valuations for Buyers, Sellers, attorneys and lenders.  We generally limit valuations to only those provided by one of the five SBA Qualified Source categories such as a CPA with a ABV or CVA  designation.   Mr. Flynn is an "Industry Expert" to the Business Reference Guide in the manufacturing and staffing industry segments.  The Business Reference Guide is the leading provider of "Rules of Thumb" for business valuations and is published annually.

We are members of Rhode Island MLS, the National Association of Realtors, and also members of Kent-Washington Board of Realtors. Robert Flynn is an Associate Broker member of North Star Realty in the  Rhode Island office.

Mr. Flynn is a Cooperating Intermediary with the Gottesman Company in Manhattan and active in Metro New York, Worcester, Plymouth, Massachusetts, Hartford, New Bedford, and Boston.

Robert Flynn is also an author at www.Axial.net with various published articles. Please see archives in the "News and Articles" section of the www.unitedbrokersgrp.com website.
